The Pleasant Choir travelled to Oak Harbor High School last Friday to perform and sight read at the Ohio Music Educator Association's Large Group Contest. The students sing in front a panel of three judges, then sight read (read/perform music they've never seen) in front of another judge.

All four judges rated the Pleasant Choir with a Level 1 - Superior. With the rating, the choir now moves on to the State level in May! (likely the 1st).

If you have the opportunity, please congratulate any choir student you see. They truly have worked SO hard!

Our Spring Concert is Monday, May 11th at 8:00pm, if you're looking for an opportunity to see them in action!
